subject: Hockey, Ice
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Buffalo Sabres goalie Ryan Miller won the Vezina Trophy, awarded to the N.H.L.’s top goaltender, and Duncan Keith of the Chicago Blackhawks won the Norris Trophy as the league’s top defenseman.
snippet: Buffalo Sabres goalie Ryan Miller won the Vezina Trophy, awarded to the N.H.L.’s top goaltender, and Duncan Keith of the Chicago Blackhawks won the Norris Trophy as the league’s top defenseman.
